About Me

BIO

From a young age, I was always fascinated by technology. My dream job was to become a programmer since the 8th grade. Well, now I'm finally starting to make that dream a reality. Born and raised in the New Orleans area, I started working as a maintenance worker for a hotel. Though the money was great I decided to join Tech Talent South to learn how to become a programmer. Starting with front end development, I learned Html, Css, and Javascript. Learning how to code has become a favorite passtime of mine, and I hope to continue to expand my coding knowledge. I'm 23 years old and making my dreams come true through grit and determination.
